markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Accursed Claws](/Feats.aspx?ID=4539) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
claw unarmed attack

</column>

---

Your claws carry your mother’s hag magic. When you critically hit with a claw [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=89), the target takes an additional 1d4 [persistent mental damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
name: Accursed Claws
